mapper.select: select * from Cmember order by name
mapper.insert: insert into Cmember (id,pw,name,gender,birth,basic_addr,detail_addr,post,email, hp, regdate) values (#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{gender},#{birth},#{basic_addr},#{detail_addr},#{post},#{email},#{hp}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from Cmember where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
